short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension change href to “javaScript:void(0)”, so you can't accidentally click and go to the other page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- Set initial href in title (so you can see it in toolkit)
- Set new cursor on hover 
- Works after reload
- One click on and off switch

Version 2.0 :
- Works with "target:_blank" links
- Save initial title and target in attributes
